tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE interventions (
  intervention_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  intervention_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  community_id UUID NOT NULL,
  impact_description TEXT,
  intervention_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE successful_interventions (
 intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 intervention_name VARCHAR(255),
 intervention_date DATE,
 impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE community_impact (
 community_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 community_name VARCHAR(255),
 intervention_id INT,
 impact_score INT,
 impact_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE human_rights_organizations (
 org_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 org_name VARCHAR(255),
 intervention_id INT,
 organization_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE intervention (
    intervention_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    intervention_type TEXT,
    intervention_details TEXT,
    case_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES case_study(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE impact (
    impact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    impact_type TEXT,
    impact_description TEXT,
    intervention_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (intervention_id) REFERENCES intervention(intervention_id)
);
